classifications.question: What is your current role or job title?
How long have you been employed at this organization?
Overall, how motivated do you feel at work?
Which factors motivate you the most in your job?
I feel my work is meaningful and contributes to a larger purpose.
How satisfied are you with your current workload?
What best describes your level of autonomy at work?
I receive enough recognition for the work I do.
How often do you feel stressed at work?
Which of the following best describes your relationship with your direct manager?
I see clear opportunities for career growth within this organization.
How satisfied are you with your compensation and benefits?
What primarily drives you to perform well at work?
I feel psychologically safe to express ideas or concerns at work.
Which benefits would most improve your motivation?
How likely are you to go above and beyond your job requirements?

report.justification: You should explore sub areas such as peer relationships, sense of inclusion, and team collaboration to gain deeper insights into how connected and supported employees feel within their teams.

suggestedQuestions.question: How connected do you feel to your team on a day-to-day basis?
Which of the following best describes your sense of inclusion within your team?
Do you feel comfortable being your authentic self at work?
Who do you usually turn to for support or guidance within your team?
What factors make you feel a strong sense of community at work? (Select all that apply)
